alerts.description: Email Alert To Onboarding Central Admin
Error message email alert to Onboarding Central Admin
Onboarding account rejection alert-Central admin to tm & RM
SAP number email Alert To Onboarding Central Admin

fieldUpdates.name: Update Approval Status - Draft on Recall
Update Approval Status for Zonal Head

fieldUpdates.formula: CASE(Account_Type__c , 'Bill To Party', Billing_Street_3__c, 'Sold To Party', Billing_Street_1__c, 'Ship To Party',Billing_Street_3__c, 'Group',Billing_Street_1__c, NULL )
fieldUpdates.name: Update Billing Street
Update status of Approval Status Field

rules.fullName: Account Onboarding Rejection alert by Central Admin
rules.description: created by pallavi for Account Onboarding

rules.fullName: Billing Street Update for France Customer

rules.formula: And( RecordTypeId = '01228000000p8v5', ( ISCHANGED( Mobile__c ) || ISCHANGED( BillingCity ) || ISCHANGED( BillingPostalCode ) || ISCHANGED( BillingCountry ) || ISCHANGED( Email__c ) || ISCHANGED( Phone )))

rules.fullName: Update Account - Neebal Integration Status - Create
rules.formula: AND( NOT( $Profile.Name = "Neebal Integration User"), TEXT( Decision_Maker__pc )="Yes", NOT(ISBLANK( Village__pc )), ISNEW() )

rules.fullName: Update Account - Neebal Integration Status - Update
rules.formula: AND( NOT( $Profile.Name = "Neebal Integration User") , NOT( ISBLANK( Neebal_Farmer_Id__c ) ), TEXT( Decision_Maker__pc )="Yes", NOT(ISBLANK( Village__pc )), OR( ISCHANGED( FirstName ), ISCHANGED( MiddleName ), ISCHANGED( LastName ), ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISCHANGED( Owned_Land_in_Acer__pc ) ) )

rules.fullName: Update Account - Neebal Integration Status - Update%28Ready for Creation%29
rules.description: Updates Neebal Integration Status to Ready for Creation on Update if the Neebal farmer Id is Blank.
rules.formula: AND( NOT( $Profile.Name = "Neebal Integration User") , ISBLANK( Neebal_Farmer_Id__c ), TEXT( Decision_Maker__pc )="Yes", NOT(ISBLANK( Village__pc )), OR( ISCHANGED( Decision_Maker__pc ) , ISCHANGED( FirstName ), ISCHANGED( MiddleName ), ISCHANGED( LastName ), ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISCHANGED( Owned_Land_in_Acer__pc ) ) )

criteriaItems.value: SWAL Farmer,SWAL PreRegistered Farmer,Onboarding account,Lead Customer,Neo Fog

rules.booleanFilter: 6 AND (((1 and 2) or (1 and 3) or (2 and 4)) AND 5)

criteriaItems.value: SWAL Farmer,SWAL PreRegistered Farmer,Entity,Onboarding account,Lead Customer,Neo Fog

UPI Canada Division,UPI Aquatics Division,UPI AG Division,US Labs,AKC Retailer,SWAL Retailer,Retailer,Prospect,Group,Influencer,Ship To,France Farmer,Grower (Business),Grower,Customer On-Boarding,Customer On-Boardings

SWAL Farmer,SWAL PreRegistered Farmer,Entity,Hannaford Farm,F3/C3/Sales Team,UnRegistered Farmer/Retailer,Onboarding account,Europe Farmer Account,Europe Retailer Account,Pandoforce Farmer,Un-Register Consumer,Register Consumer

UPI Canada Division,UPI Aquatics Division,UPI AG Division,US Labs,AKC Retailer,SWAL Retailer,Retailer,Prospect,Group,Influencer,Ship To,France Farmer,Grower (Business),Grower,Neo Fog

rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISNEW() ), LEN(PersonMobilePhone)=10, NOT(ISBLANK(Village__pc)) )

rules.description: Update Registered Date and Registered by

rules.formula: AND( OR( ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISNEW() ), OR(RecordType.Name == 'SWAL Farmer', RecordType.Name == 'SWAL PreRegistered Farmer') )

AND(OR( ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISNEW() ), RecordTypeId != '01228000000p8v5', RecordTypeId != '01228000001How9', RecordTypeId != '01228000001HowA', RecordTypeId != '0120K000001HuOX', RecordTypeId != '012280000001NBR', RecordTypeId != '0120K000001HtSZ', RecordTypeId != '0120K000000wSIx', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Influencer', RecordType.Name != 'SWAL Farmer', RecordType.Name != 'SWAL PreRegistered Farmer', RecordType.Name != 'SWAL Retailer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Group', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Entity', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Grower_Business', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Grower', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Prospect_Iberia', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Lead_Customer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Ship_To', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Hannaford_Farm', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Onboarding_account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Neo_Fog', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'F3_C3_Sales_Team', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Europe_Farmer_Account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Europe_Retailer_Account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'UnRegistered_Farmer_Retailer' , RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Un_Register_Consumer' , RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Register_Consumer' , RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Customer_On_Boarding_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Customer_On_Boarding' )

AND(OR( ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISNEW() ), RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Distributor', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'US_Distributor', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'US_Labs', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Lead_Customer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'AKC_Retailer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'SWAL_Retailer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Retailer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Europe_Farmer_Account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Europe_Retailer_Account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Grower_Business', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Grower', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Business_Account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Prospect', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Influencer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Neo_Fog', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Group', RecordType.Name != 'SWAL Farmer', RecordType.Name != 'SWAL PreRegistered Farmer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Entity', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Prospect_Iberia', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Ship_To', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Hannaford_Farm', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'F3_C3_Sales_Team', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Onboarding_account', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'UnRegistered_Farmer_Retailer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Customer_On_Boarding_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Customer_On_Boarding', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Register_Consumer', RecordType.DeveloperName != 'Un_Register_Consumer' )
AND( OR( ISCHANGED( PersonMobilePhone ), ISCHANGED( Village__pc ), ISNEW() ), RecordType.Name == 'Grower' )

AND( OR(RecordType.Name = 'SWAL Farmer',RecordType.Name = 'SWAL PreRegistered Farmer',RecordType.Name = 'Farmer',RecordType.Name = 'PreRegistered Farmer'), OR(NOT(ISBLANK( Village__pr.Postal_Code__c )),ISBLANK( Village__pc )) )
